title: Klotz Fined $500 for Finance Report Violation Forward Paperwork on to Prosecutor - WTCA
content: Klotz Fined $500 for Finance Report Violation Forward Paperwork on to Prosecutor  WTCA
description: Friday afternoon the Marshall County Election Board conducted a hearing on a complaint filed by Nicole Haskins last month. Haskins reviewed a number of candidate financial reports and found issues in almost everyone. The issue she found in Stan Klotzâ€™s report did not list the banking institution where his campaign finances were held. Because the
